## New Beginnings Are Not Clean Slates

The myth of the clean slate is comforting â€” and false. Real beginnings carry memory, scars, and continuity. This piece reflects on how true renewal grows not from erasure, but from integrity and forward faithfulness.

tags: New Beginnings Are Not Clean Slates

The myth of the clean slate is comforting â€” and false. Real beginnings carry memory, scars, and continuity. This piece reflects on how true renewal grows not from erasure, but from integrity and forward faithfulness.
